biotools.summary: miRTarBase database contains miRNA-target interactions (MTIs). The collected MTIs are validated experimentally by reporter assays, western blot, or microarray experiments with overexpression or knockdown of miRNAs.

bioschemas.name: miRTarBase
bioschemas.summary: miRTarBase database contains miRNA-target interactions (MTIs). The collected MTIs are validated experimentally by reporter assays, western blot, or microarray experiments with overexpression or knockdown of miRNAs.
